import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {bindActionCreators} from 'redux'; import validator from 'validator'; import axios from 'axios'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import $ from 'jquery'; import './createprofilepage.css'; class Createprofilepage extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { name : {value : this.props.name , isValidate: true, message: ''}, mobile : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: '' }, storeName : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, storeEmail : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, storeMobile : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, streetName : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, location : {value:'', isValidate: true, message:''}, zipCode : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, city : {value: '', isValidate: true, message: ''}, } this.handleChage = this.handleChage.bind(this); this.finish = this.finish.bind(this); } handleChage(event){ const{name,value} = event.target; let state = this.state; state[name].message = '' state[name].value = value; this.setState(state); } finish(event){ event.preventDefault(); // let isValid = this.validate(); let obj = {}; obj.name = this.state['name'].value; obj.mobile = this.state['mobile'].value; obj.storeName = this.state['storeName'].value; obj.storeEmail = this.state['storeEmail'].value; obj.storeMobile = this.state['storeMobile'].value; obj.location = this.state['location'].value; obj.zipCode = this.state['zipCode'].value; obj.city = this.state['city'].value; console.log('ttttttttttttttttt',obj); } editBasicInfo() { $(".basic").prop('disabled', true); $(".basic").prop('disabled', false); } render(){ const state = this.state; return(

) } } function mapStateToProps(state){ return { authenticateState : state.inititateState.authenticateState, email: state.inititateState.email, name: state.inititateState.name, } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps)(Createprofilepage));
